data.text:
Santa María Huatulco, Oaxaca, Mexico Climate

Weather: 29.42°C/84.96°F, Wind SW at 0 km/h, 71% Humidity, 0% Chance of rain

Santa María Huatulco Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of None meters (0 feet) above sea level, Santa María Huatulco has a Temperate highland tropical climate with dry winters climate (Classification: Cwb). The district’s yearly temperature is 18.76ºC (65.77ºF) and it is -3.27% lower than Mexico’s averages. Santa María Huatulco typically receives about 225.58 millimeters (8.88 inches) of precipitation and has 222.32 rainy days (60.91% of the time) annually.
